thread.title: Rickie Fowler Was the Life of Presidents Cup After-Party
thread.title_full: Rickie Fowler Was the Life of Presidents Cup After-Party

author: Brendan Mohler
title: Rickie Fowler Was the Life of Presidents Cup After-Party
text:
Rickie Fowler Was the Life of Presidents Cup After-Party Golf 8 hrs ago Brendan Mohler © Golf
It appears as though members of the U.S. Presidents Cup team, led by Rickie Fowler, weren't the only ones who managed to have a good time following a victory in the matches at Jack Nicklaus Golf Club in Korea.
AdChoices We're not sure how this fell through the cracks until now, but International Team assistant captain Tony Johnstone was gracious enough to document the post-game celebration on his Twitter account.
RELATED: The Pres Cup Was Great, But More Changes Are Needed
Among the highlights are a Rickie Fowler/Danny Lee "shots" challenge, a number of different costumes (including those of team captains Jay Haas and Nick Price) along with Louis Oosthuizen in rare form.
NEWSLETTERS: Sign up to get the latest golf news in your inbox
See for yourself below:
Captains Haas and Price addressing the troops @PresidentsCup Internationals party. Things are warming up! pic.twitter.com/7ZHNAz8Zit
— Tony Johnstone (@TonyJohnstone56) October 11, 2015 A tough day at the office @PresidentsCup has taken it's toll on our Louis. pic.twitter.com/KIa7ycFB8E
— Tony Johnstone (@TonyJohnstone56) October 11, 2015 . @PresidentsCup Internationals party. Danny Lee not really enjoying best buddy Rickie's 'shots challenge'! pic.twitter.com/rwwyC9GThc
— Tony Johnstone (@TonyJohnstone56) October 11, 2015 Go to MSN Home
